00036 #include <string.h>
00037 #include <stdio.h>
00038 
00039 #include "contiki.h"
00040 #include "sys/log.h"
00041 
00042 #include "http-strings.h"
00043 #include "webserver-nogui.h"
00044 #include "httpd.h"
00045 #include "httpd-cgi.h"
00046 
00047 PROCESS(webserver_nogui_process, "Web server");
00048 
00049 AUTOSTART_PROCESSES(&webserver_nogui_process);
00050 
00051 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 PROCESS_THREAD(webserver_nogui_process, ev, data)
00053 {
00054   PROCESS_BEGIN();
00055 
00056   httpd_init();
00057 
00058   while(1) {
00059     PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT_UNTIL(ev == tcpip_event);
00060     httpd_appcall(data);
00061   }
00062   
00063   PROCESS_END();
00064 }
00065 
00066 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00067 void
00068 webserver_log_file(uip_ipaddr_t *requester, char *file)
00069 {
00070   /* Print out IP address of requesting host. */
00071 #if LOG_CONF_ENABLED
00072 #if UIP_CONF_IPV6
00073   char buf[48];
00074   uint8_t j;
00075   j=httpd_cgi_sprint_ip6((uip_ip6addr_t)*requester, buf);
00076   buf[j]=':';buf[j+1]=' ';buf[j+2]=0;
00077 #else
00078   char buf[20];
00079   sprintf(buf, "%d.%d.%d.%d: ", requester->u8[0], requester->u8[1],
00080                                 requester->u8[2], requester->u8[3]);
00081 #endif /* UIP_CONF_IPV6 */
00082 
00083   log_message(buf, file);
00084 #endif /* LOG_CONF_ENABLED */
00085 
00086 }
00087 
00088 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00089 void
00090 webserver_log(char *msg)
00091 {
00092   log_message(msg, "");
00093 }
00094 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
